backend/main.mo: Defines salon, booking, user profile types, initializes maps for salons and bookings, includes access control and storage mixins, and seeds default Swiss salons.
feature_evidence.json: Structured report listing implemented features, affected files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend source files for documentation or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base configuration defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode values, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component that simply renders AppV1.
frontend/src/AppV1.jsx: Large React UI implementing cinematic salon cards, presets, and a rich interactive booking interface with icons and advanced styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating an authenticated or anonymous IC actor and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity, login state, and login/clear methods.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, light/dark theme variables, utilities, and custom animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/utils/auraGenerator.ts: Generates marketing-style text snippets based on salon form data using predefined category, type, and tag descriptions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session storage values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, version history, architectural resets, UX goals, and known issues.
